title: [管理]AdvancedWarn - 自定义警告系统[1.7-1.14]
author: aipaizhanan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 aipaizhanan 于 2019-6-17 19:39 编辑 

 AdvancedWan  
一款更高级的警告管理系统

简介国外大佬Cammxx制作的插件
1.是一个高度自定义的服务器警告系统。您可以使用类别来改变对玩家的惩罚严重程度，并发出多重惩罚来强制执行服务器规则。2.AdwancedWarn包括多个GUI，播放器报告，管理员警告历史检查，离线警告，简单命令/权限等等！3.让您的管理员使用适当的警告系统遵守规则。





8673e698838ddc52a590109f9f8f96053407c536.png (6.19 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-6-17 19:18 上传




创建多个图形用户界面
使用基于类别的系统
可选的非基于类别的系统
检查人员警告历史记录
添加，获取，清除或设置玩家警告
检查警告
报告系统
停止工作人员警告同一人同时
阻止玩家同时发送多个报告
警告线下玩家
发出无限量的惩罚
对一个警告发出多重惩罚
支持多种语言
消息100％自定义

插件权限给普通玩家权限：
aw.help - 允许用户使用/警告帮助
aw.warn - 允许用户使用/警告
aw.receivebroadcast - 查看广播警告消息
aw.checkwarns.others - 检查其他人警告
aw.info - 检查警告info 
aw.categories - 允许用户使用/分类
aw.report.staff - 允许管理知道报告命令
aw.report.check - 允许管理检查报告
aw.report.remove - 允许管理删除报告

给管理员的权限：
aw.receivebroadcast.extra - 查看额外的广播消息
aw.warn.add - 允许用户使用/ warn添加
aw.warn.set - 允许用户使用/ warn set 
aw.warn.take - 允许用户使用/ warn take
aw.warn.clear - 允许用户使用/警告清除
aw.history - 检查人员警告历史
aw.protect - 允许用户使用/保护

推荐给玩家：
aw.checkwarns - 检查你的警告
aw.report - 允许用户使用/报告

aw.admin - 重新加载配置和更多

aw。* - 让你访问所有perms 
aw.staff。* - 给你所有推荐的
aw.admin。* - 给你所有推荐的更高的管理
aw.player 。* - 为您提供所有推荐的播放器复制代码

[size=14.6667px]AdvancedWarn共有8个配置文件.Settings.ymlateFormat: HH:mm:ss MM-dd-yyyy
prefix: '&7[&9&lAdvancedWarn&7]'
language: English
logMoreInfo: true
broadcast-all-commands: true
stop-multi-warns:
enabled: true
seconds: 8
warnings:
offline-warn:
reason: '&cBreaking our server rules. Contact Staff for more info.'
warner: Admin
default-reason: '&cBreaking our servers rules.'
remove-at-max: true
warn-gui:
enabled: true
categories:
use-categories: true
gui:
enabled: true
gui:
hide-attributes: true
close-page:
enabled: true
item-name: '&c&lClose'
item-material: BARRIER
enchanted: false
lore:
- '&c&oClick to close!'
home-page:
enabled: true
item-name: '&c&lHome Page'
item-material: BARRIER
enchanted: false
lore:
- '&c&oClick to go back!'
total-warns:
use: true
limit: 10
punishment: ban %player% You have reached the warning limit.
reason: You have reached the warning limit.
report:
stop-multi-reports:
enabled: true
seconds: 120复制代码messages.ymlBASIC-MESSAGES:
  no-permission: '&cYou do not have permission to run this command!'
  player-not-found: '&cPlayer does not exist!'
  player-protected: '&cThis player is protected from warns!'
  self-harm: '&cYou cannot warn yourself!'
  category-not-found: '&cCategory not found &d/&3categories&c!'
  not-a-number: '&cAmount must be a number!'
  categories-not-enabled: '&cCategories are not available!'
  already-warned: '&cThis player was warned a few seconds ago!'
  already-reported: '&cThis player was recently reported, please wait a few minutes!'
  no-history: '&cThis player has no warning history!'
  not-a-line-number: '&cLine number must be a number!'
  incorrect-number: '&cLine number isn''t found!'
  no-info: '&cThere is no info for this player!'
USAGE-MESSAGES:
  category-usage:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lUSAGE&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&d/&3warn <player> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn clear <player> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn set <player> <amount> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn take <player> <amount> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn add <player> <amount> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn info <player>'
  usage:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lUSAGE&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&d/&3warn <player> <reason>'
  - '&d/&3warn clear <player>'
  - '&d/&3warn set <player> <amount>'
  - '&d/&3warn info <player>'
  help:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lWARNING SYSTEM&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&7If you issued an incorrect warn remove it with &d/&3warn take <player> <amount>
    <category>'
  - '&7All players must follow our rules, if they do not warn them!'
  - '&7Use &d/&3warn <player> <category>'
  report:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lREPORT&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&3To report a player use /report <player> <reason>.'
  admin-report:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lADMIN REPORT&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&d/&3report all &7- Lists all current reports.'
  - '&d/&3report check <player> &7- Lists the report on that player.'
  - '&d/&3report remove <player> <line number> &7- Removes the report for that player.'
  take-warn: '&cYou cannot add negative warns! To take away warns use &d/&3warn take
    <player> <amount> <category>!'
  use-set-warn: '&cCommand not found, use &d/&3warn set <player> <amount>!'
  history: '&d/&3warn info <player>!'
  info: '&d/&3warn info <player>!'
  no-more-punishments: '&3There is no more than %amount% punishments configured for
    %category%!'
GLOBAL-MESSAGES:
  broadcast-message:
  - '&4&l[&3&lWARNING ISSUED&4&l] &c%warner% &fwarned &c%player% &ffor: &c%reason%'
  broadcast-report:
  - '&c&l[&b&lREPORT ISSUED&c&l] &3%reporter% reported %victim%!'
  - '&3/report check &b%victim%'
  warn-message:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lYOU HAVE RECEIVED A WARNING&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - ' &cWarned By: &f%warner%'
  - ' &cWarned For: &f%reason%'
  - ' &cTime of Warning: &f%time%'
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lRULES: &fwww.<your-website>.com&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  offline-warning:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lYOU HAVE RECEIVED A WARNING&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - ' &cWarned By: &f%warner%'
  - ' &cWarned For: &f%reason%'
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lRULES: &fwww.<your-website>.com&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  info-message:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&3&lWARNING INFO&4&l]&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&7 &c%info%'
  protected-users:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&3&lPROTECTED USERS&4&l]&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&3%names%'
  report-sent:
  - '&eThank you! Your report has been submitted! We recommend posting a report at
    (link) if you have evidence to include'
  report-removed:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&3&lREPORT&4&l]&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&3Report was removed!'
  reached-total-warns:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lYOU HAVE RECEIVED A TOTAL AMOUNT OF WARNS&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - ' &cWarned By: &f%warner%'
  - ' &cWarned For: &f%reason%'
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lRULES: &fwww.<your-website>.com&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  staff-help:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&3&lWarn Help&4&l]&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - '&d/&3warn <player> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn clear <player> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn set <player> <amount> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn take <player> <amount> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn add <player> <amount> <category>'
  - '&d/&3warn info <player>'
  broadcast-total-warns:
  - '&4&l[&3&lWARNING ISSUED&4&l] &c%warner% &fwarned &c%player% &b:: &x%player% &fhas
    reached a total amount of warns!'
  broadcast-clear-warns:
  - '&4&l[&3&lWARNING EDITED&4&l] &f%player% cleared %target%''s warnings for category,
    %category%!'
  broadcast-add-warns:
  - '&4&l[&3&lWARNING EDITED&4&l] &f%player% added %amount% warnings to category,
    %category% for %target%!'
  broadcast-take-warns:
  - '&4&l[&3&lWARNING EDITED&4&l] &f%player% took %amount% warnings from %target%
    for category, %category%!'
  broadcast-set-warns:
  - '&4&l[&3&lWARNING EDITED&4&l] &f%player% set %target%''s warnings to %amount%
    for category, %category%!'
  non-gui-category:
  - '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &lWARNING CATEGORIES&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  - ' &cCategories&3:'
  - ' &3Hack  -  Spam  -  Swear'
  history-header: '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&f&l%player% - &3&lWARNING HISTORY&4&l]&7
    &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  categories-punishment-gui: '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&f&l%category% - &3&lWARNING
    PUNISHMENTS&4&l]&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  report-all-header: '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&3&lREPORTED PLAYERS&4&l]&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  report-check-header: '&f&l&m>>&6&l&m-&7&l&m??&4 &l[&3&lREPORT&4&l]&7 &l&m??&6&l&m-&f&l&m<<'
  clear-warns: '&3Cleared &f%player%''s&3 warnings in category, &f%category%&3!'
  add-warns: '&3You have added, &f%amount% &3warnings to category &f%category% &3for
    &f%player%&3!'
  take-warns: '&3You took &f%amount% &3warnings from &f%player% &3for category, &f%category%&3!'
  set-warns: '&3You set &f%player%''s &3warnings to &f%amount% &3for category, &f%category%&3!'复制代码categories.ymlcategories:
  hack:
    reason: Hacking in-game
    punishments:
    - tempban %player% 7d Use of Hacked Client
    - tempban %player% 14d Use of Hacked Client
    - (ban %player% Third Offense; Use of Hacked Client,banip %player% Use of Hacked
      Client)
  spam:
    reason: Spamming in-game
    punishments:
    - mute %player% 1h
    - kick %player% Stop spamming.
    - tempban %player% 12h Stop spamming.
    - ban %player% You have broken our rules to many times. (Spamming) Please appeal
      on our website.
  swear:
    reason: Swearing in-game
    punishments:
    - mute %player% 1h
    - kick %player% Stop swearing.
    - tempban %player% 12h Stop swearing. Last Warning.
    - ban %player% You have broken our rules to many times. (Swearing) Please appeal
      on our website.复制代码                                                                          basic.yml

  - mute %player% 1h

  - kick %player% %reason%
  - tempban %player% 1d %reason%
